properties.name: blooming_duration
properties.description: Time in seconds spent in the blooming mill

properties.name: blooming_total_passes
properties.description: Total number of passes in the blooming stand, should always be an even number

properties.name: flitzer_duration
properties.description: Time in seconds spent in the Flitzer

properties.name: pyro_bp2_temp_max
properties.description: Maximum temperature measured at pyrometer BP2 after rolling in the blooming stand has finished

properties.name: qst_duration
properties.description: Time in seconds spent in the QST

properties.name: qst_entry_temp_estimate
properties.description: Estimated entry temperature in the QST

properties.name: tandem_duration
properties.description: Time in seconds spent in the tandem mill

properties.name: toughness_mean
properties.description: Average result of the three Charpy V-notch tests
